Commands.HP Regen: Grants HP Regen for 6 turns to the party.  Also adds Eiko's Initial BRV value to all party members' BRV.
Commands.Smite: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Raises all party members' BRV based on BRV damage dealt.

Passives.HP Regen Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using HP Regen.
Passives.Smite Charge: Increases the max uses of Smite by 1.
Passives.HP Regen BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using HP Regen.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.HP Regen Charge: Increases the max uses of HP Regen by 1.
Passives.Smite Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Smite.
Passives.Blessing of Madain Sari: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.
Passives.Buff Base&Boost Up: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.HP Regen Extend: Tremendously raises the BRV Gain based on Initial BRV.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 12 turns.Slightly improves Max BRV Up and Attack Up if Priest Racket's passive is also active.Triggers an HP attack after using HP Regen.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 12 turns after using HP Regen.HP Attack+ restores party HP based on HP damage dealt up to 10% of their Max HP.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Smite Extend: Increases Smite's max uses by 2.Moderately raises its potency.Triggers an HP attack after using Smite.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Smite.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT Holy-elemental magic BRV attack that raises party's BRV based on Attack.

Weapons.Priest Racket CP: 15: Extends the duration of HP Regen to 12 turns.Grants Small Attack Up and Small Max BRV Up for 12 turns.
Weapons.Magic Racket CP: 35: Increases Smite's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Raises all party members' BRV based on Eiko's Attack.Grants Medium Speed Up for 5 turns.
